definition: signature dish/a restaurant’s most famous dish
to recruit/to provoke/to beckon/to incur/to infect/contagious/a move (chess)/a maneuver/device/trick/to confess
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor

sentences.english: His signature dishes include Snapper Baked in Salt Crust and a tableside presentation of Fish Casserole Enriched with Crustaceans.
sentences.chinese: 他的招牌菜包括红鲷鱼配色拉和焙盘鱼及贝类配面包。

sentences.english: This is obviously such a popular combination that it is a signature dish of Kentucky Fried Chicken.
sentences.chinese: 这种组合那是相当的出名，几乎就是KFC的招牌菜。

sentences.english: Saute leek and pork liver with mango salsa is the special of this restaurant.
sentences.chinese: 葱炒猪肝佐芒果莎莎酱是这家店的招牌菜。

sentences.english: Excuse me, waiter, what's the specialty of the house?
sentences.chinese: 对不起，服务生，你们的招牌菜是什么？

sentences.english: Something almost like a pleased smile broke his thick lips.
sentences.chinese: 老王的同事，有着招牌菜一样的香蕉型厚嘴唇。

sentences.english: A: I think I’ll have a Kung Pao chicken, since that’s their specialty.
sentences.chinese: 我想我要一份宫爆鸡丁，这是他们的招牌菜。

sentences.english: Here you go…This is one of their signature dish – "Claypot Chicken in Foochow Red Wine Lees (Hong Zao)".
sentences.chinese: 砂煲红糟鸡是这里的其中一道招牌菜。

sentences.english: What is the specialty of the restaurant?
sentences.chinese: 你们店的招牌菜是什么？

sentences.english: Yes, could you introduce your famous dishes and today's special?
sentences.chinese: 好的，能为我介绍一下你们的招牌菜和今日特色菜吗？

sentences.english: I think I'll have a Kung Pao chicken, since that's their specialty.
sentences.chinese: 我想我要一份宫爆鸡丁，这是他们的招牌菜。

sentences.english: Could you recommend something special here?
sentences.chinese: 你能介绍一下这儿的招牌菜吗？

sentences.english: Guest B: What's your specialty or can you give us some suggestions?
sentences.chinese: 你们的招牌菜是什么？或者可以给我们一些建议。

sentences.english: Rat dishes are prevalent in food stalls in Zhong Village, many restaurants make it house specialties.
sentences.chinese: 鼠宴在钟村特别流行，很多餐馆都有老鼠这道招牌菜。

definition: dish (food prepared according to a specific recipe)
dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
chicken in rice wine/also translated drunken chicken
mapo tofu/stir-fried beancurd in chili sauce
